item.description:
Hey - due to my car breaking down, I'm still stuck at work and not sure what time I will be able to make it to a public transit station.

I'm making an executive decision to reschedule the meetup for next Tuesday.

If this is a problem for anyone, I am truly sorry for the inconvience. Feel free to send your gripes my way. I can take it.

Alexa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there trying to save seats and reading
item.name: 20-30 Something Creative Writers of Boston February Meetup
